title: Transformer-based deep learning model for the diagnosis of suspected lung cancer in primary care based on electronic health record data

abstract: Background Due to its late stage of diagnosis lung cancer is the commonest cause of death from cancer in the UK. Existing epidemiological risk models in clinical usage, which have Positive Predictive Values (PPV) of less than 10%, do not consider the …

title: Colon cancer diagnosis by means of explainable deep learning

abstract: Early detection of the adenocarcinoma cancer in colon tissue by means of explainable deep learning, by classifying histological images and providing visual explainability on model prediction. Considering that in recent years, deep learning …
